alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued November 12 at 2:16PM AKST until November 13 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Baldwin Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall and strongest winds are expected Sunday evening and early overnight, until 1 AM AKST, with conditions slowly improving through the rest of Sunday night.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
